statements: SELECT * FROM ProteinValidationData;
SELECT protein_id, validation_score FROM ProteinValidationData ORDER BY validation_score DESC;
SELECT protein_id, experimental_method FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE validation_score > 0.5;
SELECT validation_date, experimental_method, validation_score FROM ProteinValidationData ORDER BY validation_date ASC, validation_score DESC;
SELECT protein_id AS ID, validation_score AS Score FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE experimental_method = 'MS';
SELECT * FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE validation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY validation_date DESC, protein_id ASC
SELECT protein_id, experimental_method FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE validation_score < 0.5 ORDER BY validation_score DESC
SELECT protein_id, validation_date FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE experimental_method = 'Mass Spectrometry' ORDER BY protein_id
SELECT * FROM ProteinValidationData WHERE validation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY validation_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT experimental_method FROM ProteinValidationData ORDER BY experimental_method DESC
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data;
SELECT validation_id, protein_id, experimental_method FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = True;
SELECT protein_id, experimental_method, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data ORDER BY protein_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id, AVG(prediction_score) AS avg_score FROM protein_structure_predictions GROUP BY protein_id HAVING AVG(prediction_score) > 0.5;
SELECT prediction_method, prediction_score FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE prediction_score < 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = TRUE;
SELECT protein_id, experimental_method FROM experimental_validation_data ORDER BY validation_id DESC;
SELECT protein_id, experimental_method, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE protein_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE prediction_score > 0.5 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_method, prediction_score FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE protein_id = 2 AND prediction_score < 0.8;
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data;
SELECT protein_id, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = TRUE;
SELECT protein_id, validation_method FROM experimental_validation_data ORDER BY validation_method DESC;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM experimental_techniques;
SELECT prediction_method, prediction_date, confidence_score FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE confidence_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = true;
SELECT protein_id, validation_method, validation_date FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_method = 'X-ray';
SELECT protein_id, prediction_method, prediction_date, confidence_score FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE confidence_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM experimental_techniques WHERE description ILIKE '%mass spectrometry%';
SELECT protein_id, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY validation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Protein;
SELECT protein_name, experimental_method FROM Protein;
SELECT protein_id, validation_score FROM Protein ORDER BY validation_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM ExperimentalData WHERE experimental_value > 10;
SELECT protein_id, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ValidationParameters;
SELECT * FROM Protein WHERE protein_name = 'P53';
SELECT protein_id, protein_name, validation_score FROM Protein WHERE experimental_method = 'X-Ray';

SELECT Protein.protein_name, ExperimentalData.experimental_value, ExperimentalData.experimental_date FROM Protein JOIN ExperimentalData ON Protein.protein_id = ExperimentalData.protein_id WHERE ExperimentalData.experimental_value > 0.5;

SELECT Protein.protein_name, PredictionResults.prediction_method, PredictionResults.predicted_score FROM Protein JOIN PredictionResults ON Protein.protein_id = PredictionResults.protein_id WHERE PredictionResults.predicted_score < 0.2;

SELECT ValidationParameters.parameter_name, Protein.protein_name, ValidationParameters.parameter_value FROM ValidationParameters JOIN Protein ON Protein.protein_id = ValidationParameters.protein_id WHERE Protein.protein_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY ValidationParameters.parameter_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data ORDER BY validation_date DESC;
SELECT protein_id, experiment_type, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = 'pass';
SELECT protein_id, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE experiment_type = 'XRD' AND validation_result = 'fail';
SELECT protein_id, experiment_type, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE protein_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM protein_structure_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE experiment_type = 'X-ray' ORDER BY validation_date DESC
SELECT protein_id, experiment_type, validation_result FROM experimental_validation_data WHERE validation_result = 'success'
SELECT * FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE prediction_score BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8
SELECT protein_id, prediction_method FROM protein_structure_predictions WHERE prediction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND prediction_date <= '2022-12-31'
SELECT protein_id, quality_score, model_type FROM predicted_structure_quality ORDER BY quality_score ASC
